disableInstallHelp.title: Disable opening help page on install
disableInstallHelp.description: If set to true then help page will not be opened on install.

disableBackup.title: Disable 3rd party backup
disableBackup.description: If set to true then 3rd party backup options will be hidden. If 3rd party backup is already configured for a user this will not stop it.

storageArea.title: Storage area
storageArea.description: Set to 'sync' or 'local'. If set will force user to use specified storage area. This setting will not check if a user is currently using another storage space and may hide data.

feedbackURL.title: Feedback URL
feedbackURL.description: Change the URL the feedback button opens.
